projects.name: CCDesign Web Component Library
projects.description: This project is my second actual live project in production and my first live NPM package. Purpose of this component library was to improve performance and simplify my Angular 7 website. Easy area on ccdesign.me.uk is comprised of this Web Component Library, from the carsouel to the copy.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: This project is the first actual live project in production to be viewed. Purpose of my personal website is to act like a CV and a promotion for all further projects created by myself. This project has been through a evolution, using different libraries and packages.

projects.name: University Final Year Project
projects.description: My final year project at Brunel University was title 'Using Smartphone technology to simulate human behaviour within an indoor environment'.
